original_text: The Lord God will help you. Times will come when he will cause your spirit to be strong. He has already chosen Jesus as the one to help you. He is God's Messiah, and God will send him back to you again.
korean_text: 또 주께서 너희를 위하여 예정하신 그리스도 곧 예수를 보내시리니

sentences.original_text: The Lord God will help you.
when he will cause your spirit to be strong.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신의 영을 강하게 만들 때.

sentences.original_text: as the one to help you.
and God will send him back to you again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그를 다시 당신에게 보낼 것입니다.
